channel.title: env on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe
channel.description: Recent content in env on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe

item.title: user-dirs
item.description: My environment dotfiles is where i setup my, well, environment. i3env are environment variables that i have invented myself and most of them are settings for various i3ass scripts. I could have put them in .bashrc, but I source them from ~/.xinitrc since all of them are specific to a graphical environment. Similarly export are environment variables that are sourced in ~/.bashrc. I try to keep most of my xsession related always start executions in ~/.
